name: Annoying Rolling Ball
description:
My first game designed for first assignment of class. It is kind of a practice...? But I tried to complete it as a game.

W,A,S,D to move, space to jump, ESC to pause and set volume, R to restart from save point. There will be further tutorial on the ground, then enjoy your game ;D

If you are literally  trapped, please don't hesitate to use R...
